original_text: The priests, the Levites, the singers, temple guards and other workers lived in their towns near Jerusalem. The other Israelites went to live in the towns where their ancestors had lived. The priests, the Levites, the singers, temple guards and other workers lived in their towns near Jerusalem. korean_text: 이에 제사장들과 레위 사람들과 백성 몇과 노래하는 자들과 문지기들과 느디님 사람들이 각자의 성읍에 살았고 이스라엘 무리도 각자의 성읍에 살았더라

sentences.original_text: The priests lived in their towns near Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장들은 예루살렘 근처 자신들의 도시에 살았습니다

sentences.original_text: the Levites lived in their towns near Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 레위 사람들은 예루살렘 근처 자신들의 도시에 살았습니다

sentences.original_text: the singers lived in their towns near Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 성가대는 예루살렘 근처 자신들의 도시에 살았습니다

sentences.original_text: temple guards lived in their towns near Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 성전 문지기들은 예루살렘 근처 자신들의 도시에 살았습니다

sentences.original_text: and other workers lived in their towns near Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다른 일꾼들은 예루살렘 근처 자신들의 도시에 살았습니다

sentences.original_text: The other Israelites went to live in the towns
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 이스라엘 사람들은 도시에 살러 갔습니다
